lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What did God tell Abraham he was going to do?
answers: Destroy the sinful cities of Sodom and Gomorrah
Make Abraham the king of Sodom
Flood the entire earth
Give the people of Sodom and Gomorrah an award

questions.text: What was the first thing Abraham asked? How did God respond?
answers: Will you destroy it if 50 godly people live there?, God agreed
Will you destroy it if only Lot lives there?, God said yes
Will you destroy it if 1000 people live there?, God refused
Will you destroy every city in the world?, God said maybe

questions.text: Why was Abraham worried about the city of Sodom?
answers: His nephew Lot lived there
He owned many houses there
He wanted to move there himself
He lived there

questions.text: What was the final number of godly people that God agreed to?
answers: 10 people
5 people
25 people
50 people

questions.text: When the men of Sodom tried to hurt them, what did the angels do?
answers: Made them blind
Zapped them with lightning
Sent them far away with a strong wind
Turned them into pillars of stone

questions.text: What happened when Lot told his sons-in-law Sodom would be destroyed?
answers: They thought he was joking.
They believed him right away and ran
They went to warn the whole city
They called Lot a liar

questions.text: Because Lot's family would not hurry, what did the angels do?
answers: Dragged them out of the city
Left them behind and returned to heaven
Punched Lot in the nose
Gave them extra time to pack

questions.text: What warning did the angels give to Lot's family?
answers: Run to the mountains, don't stop or look back
Hide outside the city walls until the danger passed
Go to Egypt and start a new life
Stay inside your house and lock the doors

questions.text: How did God destroy Sodom and Gomorrah?
answers: He sent fiery sulfur down from the sky
He flooded the cities with water
He shook the ground with a giant earthquake
He sent wild animals to attack the people
She turned into a pillar of salt because she looked back
She lived happily ever after
She tripped and fell
She stayed in the city of Sodom
